original_text: I have heard a rumour from the Lord, and an ambassador is sent unto the heathen, saying, Gather ye together, and come against her, and rise up to the battle.
korean_text: 내가 여호와에게서부터 오는 소식을 들었노라 사절을 여러 나라 가운데 보내어 이르시되 너희는 모여와서 그를 치며 일어나서 싸우라

sentences.original_text: I have heard a rumour from the Lord
and an ambassador is sent unto the heathen
and rise up to the battle
